article_title: Orthodontist Ben Burris Takes Legal Battle To 8th Circuit
article_text: Ben Burris, an orthodontist, wants to provide a teeth-cleaning service to patients, but can't because to do so would be in violation of the Arkansas Dental Practice Act.
